data.system_settings: Macbook Pro 2017 (13" - With Touchbar), macOS High Sierra 10.13.4
data.actual_result: The usernames show as blue instead of white
data.expected_result: The usernames should show as white
data.short_description: When adding users to DMs the usernames are now shown up as blue
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into any DM - Click 'Add friends to DM' - Select any friend to join - Observe the colour of the name in the preparing for group header and notice that is is blue instead of white
